hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'An orphan girl should be consulted with regard to marriage, and if she remains silent, that is her permission. If she refuses then she is not to be forced

chapter.ara-name: باب الْبِكْرِ يُزَوِّجُهَا أَبُوهَا وَهِيَ كَارِهَةٌ .
chapter.eng-name: Father Marrying Off A Virgin When She Is Unwilling
